website_summaries.verdict: For the price of one container you get a large container and smaller container that stack and include a scoop.
pros: The set includes optional wheels and hinged lids with measurements marked on the scoop
The smell doesn't escape, and bugs don't get in

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This food storage container arrived deconstructed with the small box in the larger box and the wheels in a separate baggy but was super easy to assemble! Took less than 2 minutes as you just have to pop the wheels in. We washed it before putting food in it but it didn't have a strong plastic smell or anything like that. The wheels don't really roll, they drag unless you apply pressure on the container as you push. This isn't really a problem as ours will stay in one place but the wheels are a nice touch. We got our pet's name in a vinyl decal which was the perfect touch!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if I got a defective one or ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got a defective one or what but I can't see how this container is air tight when there is a hole on the bottom of the container. See photo...
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing design. Major flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Decent size and decent quality, but the design is such that when you try to lift the container by the front and back handles, the latch that closes the lid onto the container flips up and the lid opens. I find it impossible to lift these containers without the latch lifting up at which point the lid opens, the container falls and the contents spill out. I don't recommend this product as this design flaw is glaring and so, so annoying.
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Dog Proof Too!
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these containers airtight,they are also dog proof! I left my 3 boxers inside the house with 2 sets of these contaners and came home to find them in various places in the house, with numerous scratches and bite marks, but still closed and the contents safe! Attempts at self-feeding were foiled! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not what we were expecting. The bottom container is big enough to hold the entire bag of dog food and we put loose cat food in the smaller container. BUT, neither container latches shut as a container should. The latches barely "snap" into place, if at all really. We've spilled the cat food countless times because if your finger just nudges the latch, it opens. Def not airtight at all. I have to believe there are better containers on wheels out there, I'd keep looking. It does move around on the wheels great, but that's the only positive I can say about it.
customer_reviews.author: ShanC

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product, cheaply made, not airtight at all.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of 3- Piece Airtight Pet Food Storage Container Combo I've received as the first time I had to return it because the lid barely latched on. Getting the replacement today, this one seems worse than the previous. There's scratches everywhere on it, the rubber liner to insulate in the first one now is a styrofoam liner. The latch still barely snaps in which there is no way this is airtight. I'd understand if this was a $10 to $15 purchase but for almost $40, not worth it at all. Save your energy do not buy. I'm returning and want a full refund, no replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Sunita Martini

customer_reviews.title: Need to leave outside and let air out before use.
customer_reviews.text: Airtight? Latches on the lids don't even actually latch onto the containers. So much for the plan to secure the dog food. It'll take the dog less time to open these containers than it did to get the bag off the shelf. I'm curious what they used to determine it holds 35lbs. Had about 10- 15lbs left in the bag of Dog Chow it just fit in the lower bucket. After seeing the quality of the casters I severely doubt they will last more than a week if you attempted to move a full container across the room.
customer_reviews.author: RL Dreams

customer_reviews.title: The smell just won't go away....
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this item. I have two other airtight storage items from this manufacturer and neither one of them has the smell that these do. I have washed them, put them in the sun, put crumpled newspaper inside - just about anything I can think of and the smell just won't dissipate. I think it's from the blue lid, but can't be sure. I can't store any packaged food/snacks in either of them because the smell absorbs into the food. I have sent two emails to the manufacturer with no reply. Could be because of the current virus situation, probably. Would like to resolve this, however. It's too bad. They have good products, from my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Terri L. Larose

customer_reviews.title: Good for pet food storage- but has a design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for cat food storage- I use the large bin for the dry food (LOVED that it came with a scoop!) and the smaller container for canned food. My one complaint is they are designed to stack, but getting to the food in the bottom container requires me to either move, or hold onto the top container. For my purpose, they are not ideal. It’s nice that the larger unit rolls since it tends to be heavy. Both are easy to snap close which keeps the cats and our dog out of the food! Overall- I really like them, but need better functionality out of the bottom unit (a way to scoop without moving the top container)
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Great Containers For The Price!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal at $22 for the set (one 25lb container on wheels, and one 10lb container that cat sit on top). You can even leave the wheels off of the larger container if you'd rather have it stationary instead of rolling (they come in a separate baggie, all you do is slide them into the holes in the bottom of the big container). I use the larger container to store my ferret's pine pellet litter, and the smaller one for various supplies (litter scooper, bags, etc.) These containers are basically what you'd expect; they get the job done. And the variety of colors to choose from are nice. :) Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviews

customer_reviews.title: Nifty lil TRIO set w/wheels
customer_reviews.text: QUICK ship; as stated. All pieces included, nothing missing. Scoop is LARGE, perfect for my bird food and supplies. The wheels are a plus if you need movement and versatility. Color is a nice option. Other sellers were selling these as seperate items ... This came with 25 lb. (Wheels included & optional) and 10 lb. sit atop (which has grooves that kinda lock it in place so not to slide when moving) as well as a nifty scoop (that seems durable). It DOES have a strong plastic odor. I used the cardboard that came with to hold the lids open to vent before rinsing and after. No complaints here. Sturdy and now am a fan of this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Tweetz

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small kitchen and for my small dog's food and treats.
customer_reviews.text: This duo is great for keeping my Yorkie's food and treats in. It comes with a good scoop and wheels for the larger bin. The tops snap to lock but the larger one is not completely airtight. Still, the set works well for my small kitchen and for my small dog to hold her dry food and also her treats and other things. I keep the dry food in the small bin and various other items in the larger one and everything is organized and together. I like that I can move the larger bin on wheels and that the smaller one stacks on top of the larger one. In all, a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: PattyTTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend sadly
customer_reviews.text: As much as I would love to say this was great but it’s far from that.. I read in other reviews that it was airtight with a rubber seal, the seal is made of foam and very far from airtight. It does hold a 14 pound bag of food but due to the lack of seal that food will go bad before it’s done.. Never would’ve bought it if I knew the seal would be so loose. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Blue lids may be defective.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase of these containers. The first were great! We bought the first one because we had nuts for our birds that ended up getting an infestation of moths in an old container. We put the nuts in this bin, and so far, no moths! I love that I can roll it around, and so far, it has held up well. Unfortunately, in this order, the large bin is not airtight. The latch is very loose, as if the seal is not working. I’m giving them 3 stars because I have tried calling customer service, left two messages, and no response. Maybe the container with blue lids are defective.
customer_reviews.author: srfnswm

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a container to storage my dog's food. After some research I found this one. I liked the idea to use the big container for the food and the small for his treats. And this works great, i love the wheels, The only cons I see is that the smaller container is not easy to close Thats why I give it 4 Stars
customer_reviews.author: M. Sada

customer_reviews.title: keeping roaches out ...under sink cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I really feel happy finding this product. I noticed a lot of tiny roaches using open containers stored for trash, and other items seek home for their breeding ..even in to the tray of kitchen towels. SO NOW they are not able to enter my daily trash and all of my items I have stored, and like the see through for items stored.. I also got rid of my cabinet doors and will cover this space with 100 percent cotton curtains for easy access. " living lightly and easy access it just fit without the doors..which only got in the way,,,,
customer_reviews.author: AKAsun&moon

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality decent space saver
customer_reviews.text: Functionality, space saver, looks great. The only thing I don’t like is the closures do not snap “tightly” they do close however. The top one seems to snap a little better than the bottom one. Time will tell if they keep the food fresh. If not I can always use them for storing something else. These do have ridges so the top container will not slide off. Scoop has measurement lines so you can measure out the food. So far it's been fine but I will come back and update in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Yeraldin

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money BUT has a major design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this container set, however it has a major flaw. The latches barely latch shut, and they are at the natural carry/handle location, so it's really easy (even being careful) for the latch to slip open and spill the contents of the container. This is especially problematic for the smaller container that you MUST pick up at some point even if you generally move them around on the wheels. Given the loose fit of the latches, I am skeptical about the claim of these being airtight. I would not recommend for long-term storage of anything perishable (including cat/dog food).
customer_reviews.author: C. Heartwell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but not what expected
customer_reviews.text: Great product but top portion not what expected. I've had the same item for yrs with just the bottom container, extremely pleased. It's well made durable plastic with a good seal, heavy duty scoop, easily wiped clean- bought xtras for other uses around house. Holds an extra lg bag of cat food and easy to roll in/out pantry. However, if you pick it up wheels fall out, they pop right bk in. I was disappointed bc the top bin doesn't actually snap on top ... It just sits there and therefore slides and falls off.. I could have just bought a cheap plastic box somewhere else if that's what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great for LEGO
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my kids to put their Legos in. Was getting tired of stepping on them and my kids didn’t want to pick them up because they had to keep walking back to the storage container. The wheels on this container has solved that problem. My daughter likes to use the scoop that came with it to scoop up LEGO pieces to put in the bin. The wheels glide easy on wood floors and carpet. I like additional tote that comes on top. We use it to store the LEGO manuals and any builds the kids want to save. I definitely plan on getting another one for their other toys.
customer_reviews.author: Mys17

customer_reviews.title: Multi pet house hold you need this also I love the wheels 🥰🥰
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and color. 🥰🥰🥰 Dog food on the bottom. Cat food on the top. Both my fur babies are girls and I love the color to match all their other pink accessories . Has a rubber like seal ring on the top love that. Keeps it fresh. Oh and another thing it has wheels🥰🥰 easy to move. It was 1 minute to put together. Another excellent thing is the scooper🤗🤗🥰🥰
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold as much as it says, but still very useful
customer_reviews.text: The description says "Up to" 25 lbs. It would seem like 25 is what it *should* hold but it did not. We had a 20lb bag of food and it didn't all fit in the rolling container. The rest fit in the top, but I was hoping to use the top one for cat food. Other than that minor inconvenience, it looks nice, it opens and closes easily. I'm not sure it's actually air tight but it's tight enough. Really helped maneuverability and makes the kitchen look cleaner than having a big crumpled bag sitting around.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Shipley Jr

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money! NOT AIRTIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: When this set arrived, the smaller container would snap shut but onoly lightly and definitely didn't seem airtight in any way. The larger container wouldn't even snap when you closed it, it just laid across the other piece and was certainly not airtight. My dog was easily able to flip it open with just his nose and got into his food the first day that I put some inside. I should have sent it back as soon as I received it, but now I assume it's too late since it's technically been used. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: B. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for dog food/snack storage
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved seeing this so I had a place to store my puppers food & snacks. You can put the wheels on for easy maneuverability or leave them off. The bag of dog food fit perfectly and the snacks fit on the smaller container. The measuring scoop has lines for cup servings. The food container didn’t snap close for me as the snacks container did. That’s the only set back and why I have a 4. I can see a dog knocking off the snack container and using its snout to open the food and go into a food coma
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased these!
customer_reviews.text: These airtight bins are the best! My dog food, cat food, outdoor bird food, and treats were either on my kitchen table or in one of chairs. Now I have my table & chairs back, nice & neat and all pet foods are stored neatly in airtight bins. The wheels work great when I need to move the bins, each large bin came with a scoop, & the bins held more than I expected. (Be sure to look at measurements before you buy as the bins may be smaller than you want.) I absolutely love mine & wish I'd bought them a long time ago. The price I paid was lower than I could find anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great For Bird Seed/Peanuts
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars but the "blue moon" color in the picture is not even remotely what the color actually looks like in real life, which is way less bright and way more muted. Aside from that this is great, I dumped a whole 20 pound bag of bird seed into the bottom one and it could easily fit a 30 pound bag. And then in the top one I put a 5 pound bag of peanuts for the squirrels and it filled all the way up just perfectly. It also comes with wheels so you can easily cart it around if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Non

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pet food storage
customer_reviews.text: We used to have a pet food storage like this that last us for 10 years+, but when our dog passed away we gave it to our niece dog to use. Now we have a puppy again and we had to have this same type of storage. Once I found this product on Amazon, I didn’t need to search further. The extra top storage is a plus as well as a measurement scooper. The main container fits a 20lbs dog food bag as seen in the pictures. The price is right compare to Pets Mart.
customer_reviews.author: Kepaco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, Excellent condition!
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine yesterday. The package came when expected, in excellent condition. I love the way it looks. Wheels popped on easy. So far I haven’t anything to complain about. I like the way it looks. Bottom container I put in 35lb bag of medium size dog food. Top packages of smaller dog food. I love the lack of space it takes and will be ordering 2 more different sizes for 50lb bags of sugar and flour bought during covid. Such a great way to store in pantry. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized bins for a variety of pet food, but mediocre quality control
customer_reviews.text: These bins are great for pet food -- the large is perfect for big bags of cat or dog food, and the small is great for bird pellets or seed, or other smaller pet food. I liked the first set so much that I actually bought a second. Unfortunately the second large bin is not the same level of quality as the first, and I'm not confident that it's actually airtight, as the lid doesn't latch. The lid's latch simply rests in the down position, no click or anything to secure it in place, nothing to keep it tightly sealed, nothing to prevent it from spilling if knocked over. Kind of bummed.
customer_reviews.author: tiny bearTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have an older set of these and they are great. This set came and though they are good for the price I see the quality has gone down a bit. Leftover plastic left around the ridge of the containers I had to cut off myself is not what I expected, so one star removed. I also noticed the plastic thinner on this newer set. Yes, they do have an odor but it's plastic, it needs washed before use, not a problem, I wash everything before I use it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kop

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves to help with everything. We have given her the task of feeding our cat & dog as her daily chore. This storage container has been so helpful! She can move it around and use it with ease and I don't have to worry about spilled food everywhere! It is sturdy and the wheels roll very well. The included scoop is great. Very happy with this purchase. Only con was the plastic did have a funky smell. I washed it up well and let it air out. The smell dissipated within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Parker

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money. Look for something else.
customer_reviews.text: First, I didn't receive the scoop or the wheels. Second, the bottom container barely latched closed. I wouldn't go as far as to say it's airtight. It's not really even closed. I contacted product support to get the scoop and wheels and did receive a response. They asked for my address and I have yet to receive anything back. Not even a confirmation. I would return it but I guess maybe I'm still holding out for replacement parts? I did ask for them, so I should at least wait, right? Even if the containers latched tight, I would have been fine for awhile. But it doesn't. I would look into something else.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Is it air tight???
customer_reviews.text: Just received the storage containers and really like the size and ease of moving it about. It holds a large amount as does the smaller container but as you can see I’ve left the food in the bags because I’m really unsure that their air tight. If you look at the small video you can see that that when I close them they do not close as I expected there’s no snap or click to show it’s closed it just flaps about
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: A customer for life! 5 Stars! Durable & Airtight
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these bins! They are sold as dog food bins, but I use them for my kitchen. I have multiple bins each one labeled according to its contents. Some of the contents for example, are 25# All Purpose Flour, 25# Bread Flour, 25# Self Rising Flour, 50# Granulated Sugar, and 20# Powdered. These containers are amazing! They roll along anywhere I want them to go. And everything is always fresh inside. I will keep buying new ones as I get room for them and have need this is the best brand ever! A customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: JHambel

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this one!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite things I purchased when we got our puppy. It fits very nicely under the counter in our pantry and is very easy to move in and out. I appreciated that it also came with a large scoop as many of the ones I looked at did not. It arrived quickly and holds a lot of food - less than the 40 lb bags that I buy so I always have some leftover that I try to go through first. All in all, very happy with the quality of this item and the convenience it brings.
customer_reviews.author: HillP

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, functional and durable pet food container.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pet food container that comes with a scoop and has an extra container for toys or treats. I attached the wheels that were provided and the container slides around with ease. It holds a 20 pound bag of dog food. I purchased one of these about 3 years ago for my son and It has withstood the test of time so far and still looks new. I was so impressed with the durability and usefulness of this set that I recently purchased 2 for my best friend’s pets. I will definitely buy more of this same one when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Pride Enterprise

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I feel let down by this product. It should have been perfect. I have a puppy and a senior dog and they each have their own dog food. This is perfect for my needs, however, the latch on the lids is not secure at all. I have no doubt that the puppy could pop it open with very little effort. I have it turned, latches facing the wall, but I will still have to worry about doggy mischief or if one of my teenagers does the feeding and forgets to push it facing the wall. It is super disappointing.. I'm keeping it to serve my immediate needs but I will be looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Quart size is not accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Capacity: 33-quart container stores up to 25-pounds and 12-quart container stores up to 10-pounds I don't know where they got these numbers from because 33qt = 68.8496 pounds and 12qt = 25.0362 pounds The actual size in quarts for the small one is 4.7931 quarts (10 pounds) and Large one is 11.9826 quarts (25 pounds) I am very disappointed in the misleading quart sizes. Now I'm going to have to buy more than 1 (kit) to hold my pets food. Be warned if you buy these the numbers they give are not even close to accurate.
customer_reviews.author: The GreyOne

customer_reviews.title: Low price and effective!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this! It arrived smaller than I expected but I’m glad! The design is great, holds the amount of food it’s describing while still being compact and maneuverable. It does come with wheels which helps too! We use this for our dog food on bottom and cat food on top. Wheeling it over to their feeding station makes it so simple! Comes with a nice scoop too. Plastic is sturdy and seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: MrsLucas

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. It seemed very sturdy, but one side of the the smaller container's hinge wasn't attaching properly. I continued to attempt to reattach it but it just wouldn't go. Lots of overhanging plastic from the original molds. When I opened the small container and looked on the inside of the lid, it was covered in finger prints. I sort of get the impression that the defective product was resent by Amazon, rather than my being the first recipient. But as I have no proof other than fingerprints and a broken hook, I'd simply suggest caution and a willingness to return.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Functional but not well made
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done, but it is pretty cheaply made. I cut myself on the plastic around the top of the food storage container, which is ragged and sharp. The lids fall off if you open them all the way. The scoop design does not make it great for quickly measuring amounts smaller than 2 cups. The wheels easily pop in. Also, the lid opens up, so keeping items stored on top of it is not convenient, which I should have realized before ordering. That said, it was relatively inexpensive and I am still using it for the purpose for which I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Pancakes Today

customer_reviews.title: My initial impression, I really Like it!!
customer_reviews.text: As an initial impression, I really Like it! It was simple to unbox and put together. Its great for a household with multiple breeds or sizes of pets. It does hold just enough but not too much (less than a 30lb bag of dog food for large container 10lb or less of cat for small container) of pet food. Its a great space and time saver as well as a food preserver which is exactly what I was looking for. I got it today so I have yet to see how it holds up but Im looking forward to finding out!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Useful but has some flaws
customer_reviews.text: It is useable but Mediocre at best . I bought the same one on Groupon for the same price but figured this would be quicker since it’s amazon . It’s not airtight , it has a thin foam around but that about it . The wheels are super weak and smaller compared to my other one from Groupon which i love . It feels like there’s rocks in the wheels and most do the time the wheels jam. Not worth the time especially with covid to return so I’m keeping it . Overall holds the food and what not but to describe it I’d say “Eh”.
customer_reviews.author: andrea ferrari

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite dog-related purchases ever.
customer_reviews.text: Before this, I was just using a big black folder file clip to close the dog food. Having a dedicated container with a large scoop is so much easier. The container is transparent enough to help me know when to reorder food too. I don't use the wheels on this because then it wouldn't fit under my kitchen sink. The container is easy to open & close with one hand. The container does get a little warm and humid, so I try to wave the air around every once in a while to dry things out.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley  Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Decent for what it costs.
customer_reviews.text: So I like this, its not as big as I thought it was, but it holds a full 16lb bag of kitten food and 1/3 of another with room to spare. The second small storage held about 60 cans of fancy feast kitten food. So im happy with the quantity of storage. The only thing i have to gripe about at the moment is the locking mechanisms are so loose and poor. The slightest movement and it unlocks. So not sure how to fix that. But it seems to be a decent storage container.
customer_reviews.author: Vyxin

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this is made in the USA. However, I am a little bit disturbed that this company is not listening to these complaints. I read the comments before purchasing, so I knew beforehand it was not airtight. However, I was a little shocked at how loose it really is, which is ridiculous. Both containers are loose, so don't expect much. I have a couple of heavy books on the lid, and it's still quite maneuverable, plus, it has been dropped, and toppled over, without cracking. So three stars for that.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Functional but would have preferred a cup instead of a scoop for measuring
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use at my parent’s house for when my dog visits them. This way any leftover food, has a safe place to be stored and it can be moved out of the way. Both containers were functional and helpful. However, four stars because the scoop is a little hard to read to accurately measure his food. It would’ve been more beneficial to have an actual standard measuring cup style accessory to allow for more accurate measuring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds food, but not airtight
customer_reviews.text: When we got it, the latch on the larger one didn't work. It didn't "catch" and would just unlatch. Fortunately the lid on the smaller container was identical and after swapping them, the latch worked better. Unfortunately neither container is airtight and neither latch is strong, it only 'just' locks it down. So we just put our 20lb bag, inside the container, bag and all. But a good price for it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed:  Not Airtight and Plastic is Brittle
customer_reviews.text: As the headline reads I'm disappointed with this product. It's not airtight the handle barely engages on both containers. It is just a strip of foam going around the outer edge there is no way there is enough clamp force from the handle to be air tight. We've owned it less than a month and the lip of the larger container already cracked from gripping it to steady the container when filling with dog food. Looks decent, holds dog food, and the wheels work as they should and are a nice feature. Overall I WOULD NOT BUY AGAIN it's not airtight as described and it's a REALLY cheap brittle plastic. Going to look into seeing if I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: great dog food container!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, easy assembly! So far, so good! My only extra info to share: The smaller treat container box (about the size of a woman's shoe box), only sits on the larger container, it is not secure in anyway. so, as we feed the dogs (3x a day), we have to move the smaller treat box to a table and scoop out what we need. It would be an easy fix w/ some sturdy velcro, just have to get around to ordering the velcro. Otherwise, it's as advertised & works well!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for dog food storage!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It’s exactly what I needed! We got a new puppy and I needed a separate container for his puppy food. It holds at least a 25lb bag of food. And the bonus is the smaller container up top! I use that for dog treats and/or medicine or other little things the dogs need! Pros: It has wheels It holds my dogs entire bag of food The second storage container on top Easy to open lids Cons: Can’t think of any!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Returning..
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller then expected or that the measurements on the listing states and the wheels don't roll very well, also it doesn't lock at all. So if it tips over everything in it spills out, which is what I just had to deal with. I'm not happy at all with this. It's not made well at all. I'm gonna send it back and buy one from petco. I mean who ever heard of a food container that doesn't lock shut.
customer_reviews.author: Kitt

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not so airtight, but I am ok with that
customer_reviews.text: These are great for storing my dog and cats dry food. The latches are not as secure as I would like. My German Shepherd can open the container and help himself to the buffet if I do not pay attention. I keep them under a counter so it is fine most of the time. Because the latch is not that tight, I do not feel as though these are air tight. We have so many animals that they go through the food pretty fast so I am OK with it. The are great for moving around and I like you can stack them.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this exactly what I was looking for. I wanted a slim container to fit in a weird location in my kitchen that was 10.9 inches as we just built a house and added a small pantry next to custom cabinets. I wanted to store food and fill a random gap with something that wasn’t hideous. I will add the wheels once we have our trim complete and when I need to roll it around but for now storing a 16.5 lb bag in the bottom and using the top for the day to day food and scoop it directly from the top! Love this container for the most inexpensive price!
customer_reviews.author: Jjmm

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my chicken feed
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my needs, to store my chicken feed, and keep rats/mice/pests out. I do a specific mix of chicken feed, oyster shell, grit, so I use the top part for my mix, with the scoop it comes with for easy feeding. And I keep the bags of un-mixed food in the lower portion. It's excellent and keeps things nice and neat and clean. I'll probably get more of these to use for keeping my soil and fertilizers for gardening.
customer_reviews.author: HLFEMME

customer_reviews.title: Just love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! Easy to move around and the food stays fresh. I was worried that it wouldn’t because it holds a lot of food but it does stay fresh. The scooper is a good size and I love the smaller box that stacks on top for treats. My husband thought it was too big for treats so he put the leaches, a few. Alls, and 2 dog toys in it. Now when we go to the container the dogs don’t know if they’re getting a walk or fed but either way they get happy lol.
customer_reviews.author: Laura V.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and stores a lot
customer_reviews.text: This is a low quality product. I kept it since I already had to send the first order back. The so called airtight gasketing isn't continuous around the lid, so airtight it isn't. It stays in the kitchen so it won't matter that much. It's cute and the size is adequate to hold a big bag of dog food and the top holds a big box of biscuits. But if you need sturdiness, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA IN AR

customer_reviews.title: Not airtight but does hold 40 pounds of chicken food
customer_reviews.text: The bottom tote held a 40 pound bag of chicken crumble but the lid is not airtight because the clamps do not lock securely. The top is nice to hold extra treats such as seed, mealworms, etc. The two tote system is functional to store pet food and keeps mine tidy, but it does have flaws with the lids and the castors seem a little small to hold the kind of weight these totes are made for.
customer_reviews.author: S. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Lasts for Years!
customer_reviews.text: A friend bought this for me 7 yeas ago, to keep my dog food in and their treats. It is still going strong. Now that we have our3rd dog, who eats a different kibble, I ordered another one since I know how well it keeps the food, it is airtight and the maneuverability is a breeze, even when full, with the rollers on it. Highly recommend to anyone who buys pet food in bulk. I receive the item within a week, which was impressive during the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Black

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang For Your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item after my 5 year old asked to start feeding our cat as one of her daily chores. Being that we continuously buy over 20lb bags, I thought itd be wise to get something more contained and safer than getting into a bag that big every day- with tiny hands and arms. Once it arrived I instantly took the top cubbie off & used it elsewhere. The bottom half easily fit a 20lb bag and the wheels can hold the weight no problem. I looked at Target & Walmart, both we're more costly for the exact same item!
customer_reviews.author: Amber S

customer_reviews.title: Great, Quality made in USA...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store flour and sugar. I am so happy with these storage containers. The color (pink) is very pretty. The container stands too tall with the wheels on (I knew this when I bought it) but it is very easy to slide on the floor. The kids stand up when getting into the container or you can remove it completely. The containers are easy to see through so you can see what is inside. I am planning to purchase more because this really is a quality product. And made in the USA. I love that.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Almost killed our cat
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this if your cat is dumb and a good glutton. My cat almost died bc he opened up the "lock" climbed in and we didn't hear him until morning when we woke up. He's at the vet right now on oxygen and the vet doesn't know if he'll survive bc of how long he was in there.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Collins

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY with purchase!  Excellent Customer Svc!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for keeping my wild bird seed and deer corn. I am very satisfied with the product. Is as described. My order was missing 2 of 4 wheels but Customer service exceeded my expectations and quickly sent me 4 replacement wheels without question. My interaction with them was very pleasant. I will definitely not hesitate to purchase from this vendor again and will probably order a second container.
customer_reviews.author: Deb D.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my cats out of the food for now (they'd learned how to open my cupboards), but the containers definitely aren't airtight. The clasp doesn't even close tightly; there's no "snap" to it. My cats are definitely strong enough to bump the latch open once they figure out how these containers work. Also, since the container is definitely not airtight, it's really doing nothing to keep the food fresh, which is disappointing. We'll see how long the containers are useful for but I know they won't be a long-term solution.
customer_reviews.author: Craneberry

customer_reviews.title: Ehh - save your $$$
customer_reviews.text: Well I just received it & put the wheels on, and once I turned it over I filled it. So much for the airtight lock. It closes but will not latch shut, like it is supposed to. So I guess my dry dogfood will get stale pretty quick!! So, I'm very disappointed in this product! I guess you get what you pay for. Should of bought it from 'Chewy' like I was going to in the beginning. Save your $$$ & don't be stupid like me.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Don't use this

customer_reviews.title: Not airtight but does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rolling storage bin but i bought it specifically for the airtight storage of pet food and that did not deliver. Not airtight at all, very flimsy seal and the latch can be undone easily by pets. overall it will do the job but definitely not airtight as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Works, but didn't live up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: This container is nice looking and the two boxes combined hold 40lbs of food, but it does seem a little cheaply made. The snap handles on the lids are so loose there's no possible way the containers are airtight. Also, I was really excited about the wheels so I could easily maneuver the container, but they are TERRIBLE. They don't roll at all, they just scratch along the wood floor. I'm keeping the container because I needed something asap, but I'll definitely be replacing it here shortly with something nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Sealed well and keeps food fresh longer.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been having a lot of roaches lately, and the previous container we had for our dogs food, was not airtight. I had los expectations for something so cheap, but I got to admit I was super wrong. Nothing gets inside this container and has kept my dogs food fresh for longer than usual. By the time we get to the middle of the bag, he usually loses interest in his food as is not fresh anymore, I’m happy to inform that he is still eating like day one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: handy storage piece
customer_reviews.text: Okay - don't laugh but we have a pet Chipmunk. And we store all his food and peanuts in this handy container. We keep it on our back deck so that when he comes and chirps at us, we have his food/peanuts ready to give him. I know.... weird right? These containers are air tight and stack together. We put the wheels on them and they are easy to roll around the deck. They are perfect for outdoor critter food.
customer_reviews.author: BoysMom

customer_reviews.title: Usable- little inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: Wheels around good- I thought the top container would stay attached to bottom automatically when going into the bottom for food. It's annoying to take it off every single time- I suppose I shouldn't have just assumed it would. If I would have known I wouldn't have bought it. I bought 2 of them and 1 came cracked and I had to send it back. I will probably still reorder the same thing simply because I need 2 matching things for my dogs and cat and I think I have something figured out to where I won't have to take the top off every single time with both containers. They do look good when not cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Great for bulk dry cat food
customer_reviews.text: This is great - I can buy bulk dry cat food and stays fresh. I don’t have to worry about sealing the bad to keep it fresh. I like the extra small container I can fill and leave on top of the larger container. I can refill the small container from the larger container. Also comes with a nice scooper. I can move it around mice’s on the wheels - very smooth. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EML

customer_reviews.title: Good storage container for dog food and treats
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and we've had one (just the bottom part) before. However, this one's dog food container does not latch tightly enough, so I am concerned about preservation of freshness. As long as I have the treat container filled and on top of it, I think it's okay - the treat container latch does close tightly. Disappointed that I can't use them separately if I want to without sacrificing freshness of kibble.
customer_reviews.author: renmom524

customer_reviews.title: This came completely used
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! Worst product I have ever received through Amazon!!! As you can see in my photos (and you can’t see much) it’s scratched everywhere. Someone has already stored food in this and it smells. Not airtight, came with no shovel, and cane with no second container, and in the photos you can see there are no wheels either. This is someone’s old and used broken container. I’m pretty upset
customer_reviews.author: John Matthew Huntington

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item.
customer_reviews.text: This is AWESOME. I wish I found this years ago. The castors roll well, even on carpet. The smaller bin is a great addition. We keep it on top of the big bin and fill it up as needed. Less bending over to feed the "herd of puppies." The scoop I sturdy, and esdy to handle without being flimsy or too heavy. It's been dropped by little hands repeatedly and no cracks or breaks. Honestly, I cannot find a negative on it. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy T

customer_reviews.title: The plastic smell is nauseating. Our dog won't eat the food stored in the container.
customer_reviews.text: This container might work if you keep the food in its original bag. Our dog refused to eat the food I scooped from this container. The smell was overpowering when I first opened the container. I left both containers outside for 3 days to offgas. While the smell was not as brutal, apparently, it is enough to make the dog refuse her food. I would not recommend this purchase. I'm relegating the cartons to the garage.
customer_reviews.author: amlbg123

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but still great
customer_reviews.text: I love the blue color we chose. I got this because I have a large dog and two cats that way the cat food is stored on top and the dog on the bottom. The bottom lock does not seem to lock as well as the top one but the food is still stored and fresh. And I also thought it would be a bigger bottom (for my large dog) but it was smaller than expected so I kept my dogs previous one to store the remainder of his dry food.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Storage
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog and a cat so we store the dog food in the larger container and the cat food in the smaller one. It came with a large scoop which makes filling the dog's bowl easy. I wish the lids were a little more air tight as I keep them in the garage and worry about attracting bugs to the food. I compared prices and this was a good deal because it was less and they included the large scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Good for Storage
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely had to get with 2 dogs and 1 cat. Bottom bin works great. Have some issues with the top one. Doesn't seal when shut and the handle just seems flimsy. Bottom one works great though. Easy to push around to all the bowls and fits neatly in my pantry. Wheels were easy to put on. Great for an organizational freak like me. Oh and the scooper is totally a bonus! Wish the top bin came with one.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah B.

customer_reviews.title: Pefect!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 dogs! This was perfect! The lower bin fits a little more than a 25lb bag while the upper bin fits the 12lb bag for our smaller dog. It is air tight so our storage closet doesn't constantly stink of dog food. The scoop is easy and convenient. The whole unit feels very durable. I'm very pleased with this purchase and am ready to purchase another one for flour and sugar in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Girl Geek

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time buying..cheaply packages , made..
customer_reviews.text: Will never buy again description and measurements are not true.. Way small then stated. Figure larger container would carry 35lb.. not true it both containers combined..stupid.. way over priced for what you get and size. Includeing how cheaply packaged and shipped it was.. Garbage waste of time to even drive to nearest ups to return. The cost is half my gas to get there.. sad.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine

customer_reviews.title: Not airtight!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as storage to keep my baby puppy's food FRESH. Ironically the smaller container seals pretty good. The large container lid fits very loosely. A huge disappointment. I will purchase a new container when I move. Not this brand. Oh yes...the wheels are not very sturdy either. I expect to break soon. Would return, but going to use until settled in new home.
customer_reviews.author: ShowMeRock85

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two. One in blue for my dogs, and one in pink for my cats. The top container keeps leads, dog sweaters, and treats in it for the dogs, while other keeps catnip, wet food, treats, and spare collars for our cats. It's a great deal and both have lasted us over a year now. My only complaint is the top of the container- it pops off the hinges if you're not careful not to pull the top back while getting contents out.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate measurements on the scooper
customer_reviews.text: My dog was gaining weight at an alarming rate and I couldn’t figure out why? I never give her people food, I measure out the amount of food I give her for every meal, and I’m careful to buy low calorie treats for training and use them sparingly. Finally it dawned on me to check the measurement accuracy of the scoop that comes with this container. Attached is a photo of 1/2 cup measured with the scoop and what is left over after filling my baking measuring cup. Whoever the genius is that created this scoop, needs to get his head examined. Great container for dog food though.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Not airtight like the one I previously purchased! Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when we added a dog to our family, we have been using one for our cats food for the last 2 years and that one works great. The new one we just got looks exactly the same but the clasp is useless and doesn’t create an airtight seal like the old one. Super disappointed. Would’ve returned if I noticed how flimsy it was before I poured in the dog food. Will have to find a way to make it work of will toss it and eat the $20
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I'm going on faith for now regarding the Airtight-ness and freshness, but no issues observed after storing dog food for almost a month. This positive review is more about the functionality. I use the larger section for adult dog kibble and the smaller one for puppy kibble. Lots of dogs here. I like the rollers and they seem durable enough.
customer_reviews.author: ExaTextPosters

customer_reviews.title: Wheels Broke
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for our cat food and litter, but the wheels were a big selling point for me, and those broke. I was just pulling it over hardwood, but the plastic wheels couldn't handle the weight of the cat litter, I suppose. Now I just have to carry the container over to the litter box to refill. If you plan on putting heavy stuff in here, look for something with sturdier wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gross

customer_reviews.title: This set feels heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: This set is the PERFECT solution to our pet food storage and organization problems. We mix wet and dry food in the kitchen 2-3 times a day. Day-one - Already a much better process. The design and quality are premium. It feels like it will last years. We'll see. But, in initial quality and satisfaction - A+. Made in the USA - a BIG plus. Great job IRIS USA. Will definitely buy again and recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: RUN2H20

customer_reviews.title: Great ait tight pet food container
customer_reviews.text: I actually use these for trash cans. I use to use them for pet food back when I had dogs. They work great for both! I happened to have purchased the munchakin size, so I returned and purchased the larger ones. great product. Oh, I took the wheels off. I never really liked them, but the can was highly mobile full of dog food with the wheels on, but as a trash can, I don't need them on.
customer_reviews.author: MFF Coxwain

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great size storage for the price. The blue color is a bit darker than pictured, but I don't mind. I put in about 20lb of dog food in the big container without the original packaging, and put various treats and meds in the smaller container. My dog only eats about half cup of food per meal, so I use a different scoop; the included scoop is handy for transferring a full bag to the container. I received a defect (top of the lid was cracked) but Amazon sent a replacement at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Made for big animals and hard floor.
customer_reviews.text: Good. I wish the wheels locked into the body or stayed in better on carpet. One or two come out when I roll it. The scoop it comes with is clearly for feeding a large animal. I have birds so I need a smaller scoop. Other than that it’s good. I wish it was taller and thin so there was less bending. I’ll probably take wheels off and put it on a table in a future setup.
customer_reviews.author: Autismom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our pets and us also!!
customer_reviews.text: We have dogs and cats so we got two and LOVE them. They easily roll in and out of the closet to hide away and hold an entire 30 pound bag of dog food at once. The included scoops are super too. If I had one concern, it's that maybe the latches on the lids seem a bit flimsy, and that is important because if they fail you lose the "airtight" function. But only time will tell how they hold up, guess we will see. But so far, love them, highly recommend to pet owners.
customer_reviews.author: xraypro

customer_reviews.title: Not airtight
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this storage container, but left a bit disappointed because neither container is airtight. The larger container is worse because it it doesn't even click shut, the lid just sits on top of it because the gasket/air-tight seal is too thin. The smaller container isn't very tight either, but it works for treats. I just keep the food inside the bag and put the entire bag into the container to try to keep it fresh. Overall, it's a nice concept, but I took away 2 stars for the lack of functioning seals on the lids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed after getting a kitten. We used to have a single container for dog food storage but after getting a kitten we had to find a better way to store the pet food in our small apartment. The smaller container fits perfectly in the notches on top of the larger one and is the exact size to fit in the space between our counter and wall. The scoop is awesome and even has measurements on it so we know exactly how much food the dog is getting. The only thing that could make it better is if it came with a scoop for both containers.
customer_reviews.author: Sven

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for. The bottom fits my 15 pound Rachel Ray dog food bag with the bag also. I see no holes on the bottom like I saw some reviews state. So it is airtight. The legs were easy to attach and the pink color I received was so pretty it was a cotton candy pink I would say. It is what I have been looking for and I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Mullen amazon prime

customer_reviews.title: Easy, covienent, and durable
customer_reviews.text: This system allows me to store 20 pound bag in the bottom section. And top.container let's me store the organic wet food cartons percrectly. We have recently had a mouse family move in, and I do not need to worry about the in the storage bins. And wheels on the big bin allows me to move it around easily for food distributing and cleaning the kitchen floor without the heavy lifting. I recommend this product. H
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: A necessity for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! After my mother in law recommended it to me, I found it. harper on amazon than other stores like Walmart and Fleet Farm. The color matches all of my other cat products, and the air tight seal keeps the food fresh! The wheels on the bottom are really helpful for transportation, and the extra bin fits perfectly on top so it’s great for storing.
customer_reviews.author: Irelynn

customer_reviews.title: Loose clasp
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set ! I use the small one for my cat food and the larger one to store their litter.. the larger one came with a loose clasp! Thankfully it wasn’t the smaller one which is using for food because I wouldn’t want it to get stale. However if I was using both for their food I’d be pretty upset because it wouldn’t do a good job of keeping it fresh. Aside from the loose clasp issue I have no problem ! It came with wheels that you stick on the bottom so you don’t have to drag or carry a ton of weight . I really like it !
customer_reviews.author: Nabil Siddiqui

customer_reviews.title: Works well for storage
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for a 30 lb bag of dog food. It's a cute color and it also came with a scoop which was nice because I had been using a plastic cup. I like the smaller tub for some wet food cans, dog treats and a bag of mini bones. It works exactly as needed and helps keep things together and locked tight so my dog won't be able to get to it.
customer_reviews.author: AbbyValentine

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected, 30 lb capability with great mobility and easy scoop.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I really need this or just keep using the resealable bag, until I received and used it- great size and mobility with just the right scoop for every day use! It made daily feeding much easier and I can also mix different brand dog food (my dog only likes one expensive brand but ok to mix with other cheaper brand). Didn't test the air tightness but so far I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: great storage
customer_reviews.text: I've had this almost 2 years now. I bought it to put cat litter in because of the wheels. Easier to move around (not so heavy). It's worked great all this time. Sometimes the wheels come off, but if need be you can glue them in place. The scoop works great for the litter! I have several cat litter boxes, so the wheels make it great to get between litter boxes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Erekson

product_meta.title: IRIS USA, Inc. 3- Piece Airtight Pet Food Storage Container Combo
product_meta.description: Color:Blue MoonThis stacking 3-piece combo includes a 33-quart container, 12-quart container and a 2-cup matching food scoop. The 33-quart container holds up to 25-pounds while the 12-quart container holds up to 10-pounds. Both containers feature airtight seals and snap-lock latches to keep out moisture, humidity and pests while the translucent body allows you to check food level at a glance. Great for dog food, cat food, bird seed, treats or any type of pet food. And because of the airtight seal, these containers are also great for people food like flour or sugar. Whatever the use, the four rotating casters allow for easy movement around the kitchen or pantry. BPA free and made in the USA.
feature_bullets: Includes a 33-quart airtight container, 12-quart airtight container and 2-cup matching food scoop
33-quart container stores up to 25-pounds and measures 16.5"L x 10.8"W x 18.6"H
12-quart container stores up to 10-pounds and measures 16.5"L x 10.8"W x 6.5"H
Airtight seals and snap-lock latches keep out moisture, humidity and pests so food stays fresh
Made in the USA; BPA free/FDA compliant material

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
